about_me.description_paragraph_1: Welcome to my portfolio website! I'm Doolyawit Yodkaew, You can call me Diw. I am a passionate front-end developer working as an intern at 20Scoops CNX. With a deep love for technology and a keen eyes for design.
about_me.description_paragraph_2: I strive to create visually stunning and user-friendly web applications. Through my dedication and drive, I aim to contribute innovative solutions that meet client needs and exceed their expectations. Join me on this exciting journey as we dive into the world of cutting-edge web development.
